VIII.iii.1.1.a
.
Considering SC for a Tropical Disease
When deciding any claim for service connection (SC) for a tropical disease included in
38 CFR 3.309(b)
, it is also necessary to consider SC based on
manifestation of the claimed disease during service, and
a presumption that the disease, which was first manifested following discharge from service, is nevertheless related to service.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 1 - Service Connection (SC) for Tropical Diseases
